Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: http://i.imgur.com/kVxAwL1.png
white sandy beach

Baking under the heat of the scorching sun,Lit by the glow of the moon, a white sandy beach covers the area with its fine, grainy sand, extending out to the ocean. Waves gently roll in, lapping at the shore, leaving an occasional seashell in its wake. To the southeast, the sand gradually slopes upward, transitioning to a stone promenade that continues further along the ocean.
Baking under the heat of the scorching sun,Lit by the glow of the moon, a white sandy beach extends out to the ocean.

Baking under the heat of the scorching sun,Lit by the glow of the moon, a white sandy beach covers the area with its fine, grainy sand, extending out to the ocean. Waves gently roll in, lapping at the shore, leaving an occasional seashell in its wake. To the southeast, the sand gradually slopes upward, transitioning to a stone promenade that continues further along the ocean.
the harbor to the northwest
The white sand meets the edge of the promenade leading to the harbor to the north. Looking northwest, you can see:
The white sand meets the edge of the promenade leading to the harbor to the north. Looking northwest, you can see:
the stone promenade along the ocean
The white sand meets the edge of the stone promenade along the ocean to the southeast. Looking southeast, you can see:
The white sand meets the edge of the stone promenade along the ocean to the southeast. Looking southeast, you can see:
sand dune
A drift of sand has piled here, creating a slight obstruction of view, perhaps good to hide behind.
A drift of sand has piled up into an impressive dune.
the white sand
Some white, fine, silty sand.
the scorching heatresidual heat from the day
The heat is sweltering and overwhelming.slowly waning with the cool of night.
the scorching sunluminous moon

Base:Description.midnight: The moon sits high at the apex of the sky, indicating the midnight hour.
Base:Description.aftermidnight: It is after midnight, the moon beginning the slow descent toward the western horizon.
Base:Description.dawn: The sun peeks over the eastern horizon, indicating the arrival of dawn.
Base:Description.morning: The sun climbs higher in the eastern sky as morning progresses toward midday.
Base:Description.midday: The sun sits high at the apex of the sky.
Base:Description.afternoon: The sun begins its descent toward the western horizon.
Base:Description.dusk: The rays of the sun slant low over the land as sunset approaches.
Base:Description.evening: The moon begins climbing up the eastern half of the sky.

Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the middle of the area
The middle of the area.
The middle of the area.
white sandy shore

A white sandy shore, capaciously spread out. An occasional scattered hunk of driftwood juts from the sand like odd teeth guarding clumps of blue-green seaweed. Here and there multicolored shells peek out from their home embedded in the sand.
A white sandy shore, littered with driftwood from recent storms.
the bluestar-studded sky overhead
The bluestar-studded sky overhead is clear and cloudless.
The bluestar-studded sky overhead is clear and cloudless.
shimmering ocean

A shimmering mass of gleaming azure water, crisp and clear, rolling waves breaking distantly and drawing gently over the shore. In the shallows many exotically colored fish swim and play, darting here and there among the vibrant orange and red coral. In the distance the daunting shadows of larger creatures lurch slowly along, and an occasional tell tale fin breaks the surface as it streaks through the water before disappearing again.

A shimmering mass of rolling azure water, crisp and clear, rolling waves breaking distantly and drawing gently over the shore. In the distance the daunting shadows of larger creatures lurch slowly along, and an occasional tell tale fin breaks the surface as it streaks through the water before disappearing again.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \ \{ The rose-gold hue of dawn kisses the eastern horizon. \| The slowly rising sun washes the land in a rosy-golden light. \} \ \ \{ The sun dips lower toward the western horizon as the light shifts to a deeper red hue with the approach of sunset. \| The western sky is painted in strokes of burgundy and gold as dusk slowly approaches. \} \ \ \{ The sun bears down from overhead, oppressively hot and burning. \| The oppressive heat surrounds your body as the scorching sun proceeds through the sky \| The oppressive heat of the day seems to radiate from all around. \| The cloying heat of the day is oppressive and stifling, the sun beating down in shimmering waves. \| The tide lapping regularly at the shore fills the area with the repetitive swish of the waves. \| In the distance, the hustle and bustle of the city is a soft murmur, accented by the sound of the waves kissing the sandy shore. \| The cry of seabirds overhead occasionally pierce through the serenity of the tidal waters. \| The sun glints bright off the white-caps of the waves in the distance. \| Ships moving to and fro can be seen in the distant ocean waters. \| A crew member on a slowly approaching vessel begins ringing a bell, announcing their entrance into the trade harbor nearby. \| A tall gazelle in religious robes passes nearby, drawing further away before genuflecting in prayer. \| A group of young boys clad in loincloths dart through the sandy beach, pushing and shoving at one another in a race to the ocean. Diving into the waves, the group swims out into the water, voices carrying over the water as they play. \| A peasant fisher in a rudimentary vessel can be seen paddling along the coast in the distance, casting out his net at regular intervals before painstakingly hauling it back into the boat. \| A slave woman \{ with dirty clothes \| with a small child on her hip \| wearing only a chest wrap and loincloth \| carrying a large bucket \} walks further down the shore before she kneels down to search for clams in the damp sand. \} \ \ \{ The cloudless, starlit sky above casts a dim, luminescent glow over the area. \| The air around you is cool in the dim moonglow of midnight. \| The air is still in the dark of night, the luminescent glow of the night sky casting dark shadows all around. \| The stars above twinkle in the dark indigo of the night sky. \| The moon overhead glints off the surface of the waves in the distant ocean. \| A man in dark clothes begins to approach the shoreline, but redirects his footsteps and heads in the opposite direction when he catches sight of you. \| The soft glow of lanterns in the city nearby silhouette the buildings, making them seem larger than they actually are. \| A ship moored in the distant waters of the ocean seems to bob like a child's toy on the ever-moving tides. \| A woman in full robes pads quietly onto the shore, casting a surreptitious glance toward you before moving further down the dark beach. After a while, she is joined by a man and the two move even further into the shadows and out of sight. \| A splash is heard nearby, but the area is too dark to clearly discern the cause. \| The stars overhead glitter and shine, bathing the sands in a pale glow. \| The soft sound of the tides kissing the shore are the only interruption of the quietude of night. \| In the distance, you can barely make out the soft ting of finger cymbals. A muffled, ululating song accompanies the sound before slowly fading out of earshot as the breeze shifts. \| The creak of a distant vessel bobbing on the waves can be heard as the tide shifts. \} \ \}
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "You catch the muffled sound of the evening bell."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The deep sound of midday bells is heard from outside."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "Outside, the bells announce midnight."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The church bells herald the morning."); return TRUE;

X[S] \{ \ \{ The rose-gold hue of dawn kisses the eastern horizon. \| The slowly rising sun washes the land in a rosy-golden light. \} \ \ \{ The sun dips lower toward the western horizon as the light shifts to a deeper red hue with the approach of sunset. \| The western sky is painted in strokes of burgundy and gold as dusk slowly approaches. \} \ \ \{ The sun bears down from overhead, oppressively hot and burning. \| The oppressive heat surrounds your body as the scorching sun proceeds through the sky \| The oppressive heat of the day seems to radiate from all around. \| The cloying heat of the day is oppressive and stifling, the sun beating down in shimmering waves. \| The tide lapping regularly at the shore fills the area with the repetitive swish of the waves. \| In the distance, the hustle and bustle of the city is a soft murmur, accented by the sound of the waves kissing the sandy shore. \| The cry of seabirds overhead occasionally pierce through the serenity of the tidal waters. \| The sun glints bright off the white-caps of the waves in the distance. \| Ships moving to and fro can be seen in the distant ocean waters. \| A crew member on a slowly approaching vessel begins ringing a bell, announcing their entrance into the trade harbor nearby. \| A tall gazelle in religious robes passes nearby, drawing further away before genuflecting in prayer. \| A group of young boys clad in loincloths dart through the sandy beach, pushing and shoving at one another in a race to the ocean. Diving into the waves, the group swims out into the water, voices carrying over the water as they play. \| A peasant fisher in a rudimentary vessel can be seen paddling along the coast in the distance, casting out his net at regular intervals before painstakingly hauling it back into the boat. \| A slave woman \{ with dirty clothes \| with a small child on her hip \| wearing only a chest wrap and loincloth \| carrying a large bucket \} walks further down the shore before she kneels down to search for clams in the damp sand. \} \ \ \{ The cloudless, starlit sky above casts a dim, luminescent glow over the area. \| The air around you is cool in the dim moonglow of midnight. \| The air is still in the dark of night, the luminescent glow of the night sky casting dark shadows all around. \| The stars above twinkle in the dark indigo of the night sky. \| The moon overhead glints off the surface of the waves in the distant ocean. \| A man in dark clothes begins to approach the shoreline, but redirects his footsteps and heads in the opposite direction when he catches sight of you. \| The soft glow of lanterns in the city nearby silhouette the buildings, making them seem larger than they actually are. \| A ship moored in the distant waters of the ocean seems to bob like a child's toy on the ever-moving tides. \| A woman in full robes pads quietly onto the shore, casting a surreptitious glance toward you before moving further down the dark beach. After a while, she is joined by a man and the two move even further into the shadows and out of sight. \| A splash is heard nearby, but the area is too dark to clearly discern the cause. \| The stars overhead glitter and shine, bathing the sands in a pale glow. \| The soft sound of the tides kissing the shore are the only interruption of the quietude of night. \| In the distance, you can barely make out the soft ting of finger cymbals. A muffled, ululating song accompanies the sound before slowly fading out of earshot as the breeze shifts. \| The creak of a distant vessel bobbing on the waves can be heard as the tide shifts. \} \ \}
